commit.title: [gitlab] [circleci] Docker Proof of Concept
commit.message:
[gitlab] [circleci] Docker Proof of Concept

We provide a custom `Dockerfile` for Coq's CI system, based on
`ubuntu:xenial` and that adds the needed apt-based packages plus the
correct OPAM switches.

This greatly simplifies Gitlab and Circle scripts, at the cost of
having to push a Docker build. Travis is not included as it requires
significant more refactoring due to it not supporting Docker natively.

This is work in progress, we still need:

- better documentation
- versioning of images
- autobuild integration

This last point requires some design on where to store the `Dockerfile`.

Fixes #7383
